title: [娱乐]Yu-Gi-Oh!——游戏王[1.6.2]
author: xiaobaicai
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaobaicai 于 2014-2-8 13:21 编辑 

嘛  这可是经典的游戏王呀   可是现在桌游被三国杀取代。

这个插件把“决斗怪兽”给加入到了Minecraft来~   个人觉得赞~
现已加入了 722张卡片     不知道有没有克利伯   最爱李栗子球了~
单人游戏的话  村民为电脑玩家.所谓AI?


指令：(有错误  请指出  本人英语烂)


玩家 (ygo.player)

/ygo help - 帮助菜单

/ygo deck - 决斗盘

/ygo duel - 切换“决斗模式”

/ygo spec [玩家] - 旁观玩家决斗(在16块方块半径范围)

/ygo accept - 接受决斗

/ygo decline - 拒绝决斗

/ygo ignore - 忽略决斗

/ygo starchips - 查看starchip数量

/ygo convert - 把纸锻造成怪兽卡 

/ygo check [密码] - 检查卡片密码 价钱/名字

/ygo commu [玩家名字] - 开始与一个玩家的交流，当这个玩家离你近的时候

管理 (ygo.admin)

/ygoadmin help - 管理员的帮助菜单

/ygoadmin get [密码] - 得到一张卡片的密码

/ygoadmin give [玩家] [密码] - 给一个玩家一张卡片的密码

/ygoadmin givesc [玩家] [数量] - 给一个玩家starchip

/ygoadmin deck - 切换管理员决斗盘，可以编辑AI

/ygoadmin generate [实体] - 生成一个AI

/ygoadmin clean - 清空保存的决斗区域

原文：
       Player (ygo.player)

/ygo help - Brings up the help menu

/ygo deck - Deck editor

/ygo duel - Toggle "Duelist Mode"

/ygo spec [player] - Spectate a player's duel (if the player is within a 16 block radius)

/ygo accept - Accept a duel request (if any)

/ygo decline - Decline a duel request (if any)

/ygo ignore - Ignore duel requests

/ygo starchips - Check starchip count

/ygo convert - Convert PAPER to a Duel Monsters card (see "Card Forging")

/ygo check [password] - Check card password cost/name.

/ygo commu [player name] - Start a communication fusion with another player, considering the other player is close to you.

Admin (ygo.admin)

/ygoadmin help - Admin help menu

/ygoadmin get [password] - Get a card by its password

/ygoadmin give [player] [password] - Give a player a card by its password

/ygoadmin givesc [player] [amount] - Give a player (amount) of starchips

/ygoadmin deck - Toggle Admin Deck Editor (can edit other player/villager decks, takes priority over duelist mode)

/ygoadmin generate [entity_type] - Generate a duelist with given entity type (Minecart duelists!)               翻译不对的   请大神们看看QAQ权限：     ygo.player: true - Permission to use '/ygo' commands (everyone has this permission by default)ygo.admin: false - Permission to use '/ygoadmin' commands (no one has this permission by default)

下载地址在上面   还有插件没有汉化QAQ      
此图为娱乐 大家认识几张？
[groupid=542]没宝插件搬运小组[/groupid]
